Html:
Hi, guys, I have recently been able to deploy Adobe Flash Player 20 ActiveX with WSUS Package Publisher. This tutorial contains Step by Step deployment Guide with Screenshots. I hope this will help you to deploy Adobe Flash Player 20 ActiveX to clients.

You can try to follow this step by step guide with screenshots: http://www.sthshare.com/wordpress/how-to-deploy-adobe-flash-player-using-third-party-tools-wsus-package-publisher.html

I hope it will help you.
